remarks: Properties of a path between two vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Dec-2017.)
statement: pthonprop $p |- ( F ( A ( V PathOn E ) B ) P -> ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) /\ ( F ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) P /\ F ( V Paths E ) P ) ) ) $.
